short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy navigation to all of Zoho's services in a single dropdown panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disclaimer
===================================
The developer of this extension is not affiliated in any way with Zoho.
All Zoho icons and names are a trademark of Zoho.

Notice: All referenced brands, product names, service names and trademarks are property of their respective owner(s).

Version
===================================
1.2.0 - Added Zoho Notebook
1.3.0 - Added Zoho Sign and Zoho Sprints. Updated column layout.
1.3.1 - Icons Update.
1.3.2 - Added Zoho PageSense. Updated column layout and icons.
1.3.3 - Updated App URLs.
1.3.4 - Added Zoho Show. Updated column layout and icons.
1.3.5 - Changed Reports to Analytics. Updated App URLs.
1.3.6 - Added Backstage, Bookings, Workerly, Lens, Writer and Sheets. Updated icons.
1.3.7 - Added WorkDrive, Calendar, CRM Plus, Marketing Plus, Bigin, TeamInbox, ZeptoMail. Removed ShowTime. Updated icons.
1.3.8 - Added Payroll, Webinar, Learn, Voice, Wiki. Removed Docs. Updated Sheets link.
1.3.9 - Removed ContactManager
